pets

Class Bird

  • java.lang.Object
    • pets.Pets
      • pets.Bird

  • public class Bird
extends Pets
    Class that creates a bird object that inherits most of it's basic functionality from the Pets class. It overrides the eat, sleep, heal and playWithToy methods

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class pets.Pets

        actions, description, energy, favouriteFood, favouriteToy, happiness, hasDied, health, hunger, isDead, isMale, isMisbehaving, isSick, needForToilet, species, startWeight, weight

      A constructor that sets the properties of the pet.

      Method to heal the pet using medicine.
      java.lang.String playWithToy(Item t)
      Method to be called by the Player to exercise/play with the pet.

      • sleep

        public java.lang.String sleep()
        Method to put the pet to sleep and allow it to regain energy, but lose hunger. It can occasionally heal itself.
        Specified by:
        sleep in class Pets
        Returns:
        a confirmation message.

      • playWithToy

        public java.lang.String playWithToy(Item t)
        Method to be called by the Player to exercise/play with the pet.
        Specified by:
        playWithToy in class Pets
        Parameters:
        t - Item of type Toy. Consult the Item documentation for more information.
        Returns:
        a confirmation message to tell the player if it was successful or not.
